name: XRSession.updateRenderState
description: The updateRenderState() method of the XRSession interface of WebXR API schedules changes to be appliedÂ to the active render state prior to rendering of the next frame.
content:
Draft
This page is not complete.

Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

The updateRenderState() method of the XRSession interface of WebXR API schedules changes to be appliedto the active render state prior to rendering of the next frame.
